component.name: Nafees
component.summary: Nafees Web font for writing Urdu in the Naskh script

description.p: Character based Nafees Web Naskh Open Type Font for writing Urdu in Naskh script based on Unicode standard. This version has complete support of Aerabs for Urdu and updated glyphs for Latin characters. Nafees Web Naskh OTF contains approximately 330 glyphs, including 5 ligatures.
